title: SWF games by TAMBA
description:
A small list of swf games from TAMBA

Ace Driver:
The aim is to avoid the obstacles and slow down for the speed cameras, making sure you get to the checkpoints before the time runs out.

Ask The Spirits II:
Communicate with the dead and ask them questions. Be careful as they are easily offended and you could end up on the other side.

Avenue of Death:
Help Bond avoid sinister creatures and traps in order to survive the Avenue of Death.

Barcode Bedlam:
Scan the barcodes in this face paced game.

Chimney Challenge:
Hit the accountants with the snowballs. The quicker you hit the accountants the  more points you get.

Energy Champions:
Collect the recycling dropped from above by the selfish workers and place them in the correct recycling bins before your carbon workprint becomes too big.

How Does Your Garden Grow:
Step into CyberChris? muddy shoes and become a virtual gardener. 

Muck about with Cupid and Fate:
Help Cupid collect game consoles, pints of beer and hamburgers which help him progress to the vortex.

Pimp My Sleigh:
Customise your sleigh and submit to the gallery. Then race your customised sleigh (or choose one from the inventory) in the Sleigh Slalom.

Red Lead:
Help save the Red Noses by getting them safely from one side of the screen to the other, avoiding the sharp pencils.

Sleigh Away:
Help Santa retrieve his presents from his stolen sleigh. 

Sofa Bash:
Destroy the sofa with some fiendish weapons as quick as you can in this mouse-click frenzy.

Spy a Solution:
Help Barry the Buyer negotiate 20 challenges with increasing difficulty in order to save his job in this retro styled platform game.

Sunshine Shopaholic:
Collect your designer gear now and make sure your partner doesn&#039;t catch you!

Suzi Says:
Click on the gadgets that Suzi says.The faster you click them, the more points you get however, if you click on the wrong gadget you will lose points.

The Day The Office Melted:
Play as Mr Heatbuster and stop Ms. Dee Hydration from melting the office.

Tim-Ball Pinball:
Tim Henman has just hit the pinball table! Usual rules apply, simply try get as many points as you can.

Turkey Target:
It&#039;s Christmas and the turkeys have hatched a daring plan to escape the dinner table though a certain fox has other plans! Save the turkeys from impending doom and assist their bid for freedom.
